metadata.title: DASHAN 10x6.5ft Vinyl Christmas Backdrop Santa Claus Winter Snow Scene Wonderland Snowflake Backdrop Wood Wall Photography Backdrop for New Year Eve Christmas Family Winter Holiday YouTube Photo Prop
features: ❤ Fetures: Not fade, reusable, foldable and durable, lightweight, rave reviews.
❤ Suitable for: Professional studio photography and party decoration.
❤ Note: 1 pc photographic backdrop, excluding backdrop stand.
description: Welcome to DASHAN photography backdrop store
Include: Only one vinyl photography backdrop (folding).Not Include: Clips or stands or any other accessory for photography.

Material: vinyl Fabric -No Washable,Do not expose to the sunFeatures:Seamless,foldable and durable,lightweightPreparation:within 3 daysUsage: For the Photography for Newborn Baby,Children,Adults,Lovers Families,Perfect for TV/Film Production,All Kinds of Wedding,Party,Event,Festival,Activities,Artistics Portraits.

1)If you want use our picture, you can tell us the size or add content that you want, then we can customize the backdrop for you.2)If you want use your own picture, you can send us the image with JPG larger than 1MB and less than 10MB.

Ship by folding ,So there may be slight creases.Here we suggest:A: please iron the back surface with steam iron but not dry iron. Then it will be smooth again.B: Roll it up tightly with a cylinder for 3-4 days, it will be okay.C: Stretch it and clamp it to a back drop stand for,Hanging it for a few days, it also works.
Please stand the right distance when u take photos. Don't stand too close to have a good shooting effects.Also some large pictures may seem a little pixelated when viewed closely.
If there is any questions, please feel free to contact us.Thanks for your support!
